pages.title: Infection Origins
pages.text: The Radiance Is Said To Have Been A God To The People Of A Nation. Eventually, These Same People Would Go To A Different Source Of Power. The Radiance Decided One Day That It Would Take It's Revenge By Infecting Those Who Had Left It To Basically Shrivel Up And Disappear.

pages.title: Curing Radiance
pages.text: Radiance Can Only Be Cured By Activating The Void Heart, Giving You The Dusk Effect.
